name: The Mystery of Hibernia
description:
This is The Mystery of Hibernia, a game developed as part of a final year piece on a games programming course by Myself David Harper and Alex Limbrick. 

The game is a short underwater action/adventure whereby you must hunt the creatures that live in the water in order to level up and upgrade yourself in your skill tree until you are strong enough to find your fathers sunken ship and discover the reason it sank to begin with!

We hope you enjoy the adventure!
